content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error when executing a shell command to search for information on the Brno Reservoir Trail and the Brno Dam, so I used the "google" command instead and received several links. I then used the "web_search" command to search for more information on the Stezka Brnenska Prehrada trail, but received an error message. I then used the "browse_website" command to visit the AllTrails website and read about the trail, and now need to pack necessary supplies for the trip.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "packing_list.txt", "text": "Packing List for Brno Reservoir Trail:\n- Hiking boots\n- Water bottle\n- Snacks\n- Sunscreen\n- Insect repellent\n- First aid kit\n- Map\n- Compass\n- Hat\n- Sunglasses\n- Extra clothing\n- Rain gear\n- Headlamp or flashlight\n- Emergency whistle\n- Multi-tool or knife\n- Cash or credit card"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "packing_list.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Packing List for Brno Reservoir Trail:
- Hiking boots
- Water bottle
- Snacks
- Sunscreen
- Insect repellent
- First aid kit
- Map
- Compass
- Hat
- Sunglasses
- Extra clothing
- Rain gear
- Headlamp or flashlight
- Emergency whistle
- Multi-tool or knife
- Cash or credit card', type='action_result')]
"""
